cards.title: Wimbledon 2015 / Williams and Djokovic dance together after triumphs
cards.rawTitle: Williams and Djokovic dance together after triumphs

item.title: Serena Williams and Novak Djokovic dance together after Wimbledon triumphs
item.trailText: Wimbledon 2015 champions Serena Williams and Novak Djokovic dance together during a dinner celebrating their wins
item.standFirst:
Wimbledon 2015 champions Serena Williams and Novak Djokovic dance together during a dinner celebrating their wins. To the crowd's delight, the two show off their moves to the Bee Gees' Night Fever. Williams defeated Garbiñe Muguruza 6-4,6-2 to win the tournament for a sixth time, while Djokovic won over Roger Federer to claim the title for a third time

To see the full video click here

cards.title: Football / Real Madrid's Pérez denies Casillas was pushed out
cards.rawTitle: Real Madrid's Pérez denies Casillas was pushed out

item.title: Real Madrid's Florentino Pérez denies that Iker Casillas was pushed out
item.trailText: Real Madrid president Florentino Pérez says the club did not force Iker Casillas to leave and insists the goalkeeper asked for a transfer after an offer came from Porto
item.standFirst: Real Madrid president Florentino Pérez says the club did not force Iker Casillas to leave and insists the goalkeeper asked for a transfer after an offer came from Porto. Casillas, who has been with Real for 25 years, confirmed his move on Sunday during an emotional press conference. The goalkeeper also bid farewell to fans at the Bernabéu on Monday

stillImage.caption: 620x372 trailpic for Real Madrids Florentino Prez denies Iker Casillas was pushed out - video  Photograph: guardian.co.uk

cards.title: Football / Wenger praises new Arsenal signing Cech
cards.rawTitle: Wenger praises new Arsenal signing Cech

item.title: Arsenal's Arsène Wenger praises new signing Petr Cech
item.trailText: Arsenal manager Arsène Wenger reflects on last season, their forthcoming Premier League campaign and the signing of experienced Chelsea goalkeeper Petr Cech
item.standFirst: Arsenal manager Arsène Wenger reflects on last season, their forthcoming Premier League campaign and the signing of experienced Chelsea goalkeeper Petr Cech. The Gunners arrive in Singapore ahead of the club's pre-season tour where they will take on Everton, Stoke City and a Singapore Selection XI in the Barclays Asia Trophy

cards.title: Football / Casillas bids emotional farewell to Real Madrid
cards.rawTitle: Casillas bids emotional farewell to Real Madrid

item.title: Iker Casillas bids emotional farewell to Real Madrid
item.trailText: A very emotional and teary Iker Casillas struggles to speak at a press conference after formally announcing his departure from Real Madrid
item.standFirst: A very emotional and teary Iker Casillas struggles to speak at a press conference after formally announcing his departure from Real Madrid. The goalkeeper, who has been with the Spanish club for 25 years, confirms his move to Porto, saying it's a difficult day in his career. Casillas won 19 trophies for Madrid, including three Uefa Champions League titles and five La Liga crowns

cards.title: Football / Liverpool arrive in Bangkok to screaming fans
cards.rawTitle: Liverpool arrive in Bangkok to screaming fans

item.title: Liverpool arrive in Bangkok to screaming fans
item.trailText: Liverpool players land in Bangkok on Monday ahead of their match against Thailand's All-Star team
item.standFirst: Liverpool players land in Bangkok on Monday ahead of their match against Thailand's All-Star team. Led by Brendan Rodgers, the players are given flower necklaces and are greeted by cheering fans. The game is a part of the club's pre-season tour of Asia and Australia. Liverpool face Thailand's All-Star team on Tuesday

item.title: Wimbledon 2015 men's singles final: Novak Djokovic v Roger Federer
item.trailText: Our photographer Tom Jenkins is on Centre Court to bring you the best pictures of the men’s single’s final live

Our photographer Tom Jenkins was on Centre Court to bring you the best pictures of the men’s single’s final live

displayImages.caption:
Novak Djokovic celebrates.
Djokovic wins 7-6, 6-7, 6-4, 6-3 to win his third Wimbledon title!
displayImages.altText:
Novak Djokovic celebrates.
Djokovic wins 7-6, 6-7, 6-4, 6-3 to win his third Wimbledon title!
displayImages.cleanCaption:
Novak Djokovic celebrates.
Djokovic wins 7-6, 6-7, 6-4, 6-3 to win his third Wimbledon title!
